<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay"></a>

# AudioEffectDelay

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](class_audioeffect.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Adds a delay audio effect to an audio bus. Plays input signal back after a period of time.

Two tap delay and feedback options.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Plays input signal back after a period of time. The delayed signal may be played back multiple times to create the sound of a repeating, decaying echo. Delay effects range from a subtle echo effect to a pronounced blending of previous sounds with new sounds.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay_property_dry"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **dry** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectDelay_property_dry)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_dry**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_dry**\ (\ )

Output percent of original sound. At 0, only delayed sounds are output. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_active"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **feedback_active** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_active)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_feedback_active**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_feedback_active**\ (\ )

If ``true``, feedback is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_delay_ms"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **feedback_delay_ms** = `340.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_delay_ms)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_feedback_delay_ms**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_feedback_delay_ms**\ (\ )

Feedback delay time in milliseconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_level_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **feedback_level_db** = `-6.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_level_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_feedback_level_db**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_feedback_level_db**\ (\ )

Sound level for feedback.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_lowpass"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **feedback_lowpass** = `16000.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectDelay_property_feedback_lowpass)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_feedback_lowpass**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_feedback_lowpass**\ (\ )

Low-pass filter for feedback, in Hz. Frequencies below this value are filtered out of the source signal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">
